dates.description: First reports of a mysterious illness in Wuhan, China
China reports first known death caused by the new virus. This news broke just days before one of China's biggest holidays - Chinese New Year
The virus spreads and cases are reported in Japan, South Korea, Thailand, and the United States
The World Health Organization (WHO) declares what is now knows as the coronavirus outbreak a global public health emergency. There are over 9,000 reported cases worldwide.
The White House announces a travel ban on people who have been to China in the past 14 days.
The first confirmed death outside of Wuhan was reported in the Philippines, adding to the over 360 deaths already accounted for in China.
A Diamond Princess cruise ship in Japan began quarantine. Cases on the ship reached 218.
